cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.body: Your appointment on {{appointment_date}} at {{appointment_time}} has been cancelled. Please contact us to reschedule.

reschedule.title: Reschedule
reschedule.body: Your appointment has been rescheduled to {{new_date}} at {{new_time}}. Please contact us if this does not work for you.

reminder.title: Reminder
reminder.body: Reminder: You have an appointment on {{appointment_date}} at {{appointment_time}}. Please arrive 10 minutes early.
